Jeff:

Not sure if this is what you are looking for a common pattern that
works for me when I implement security for HTTP is to map URI + HTTP
Method to an authenticated user.

user=mca
/users/mca = GET,HEAD,OPTIONS,POST,PUT,DELETE

user=anonymous
/users/mca = GET,HEAD,OPTIONS

There are lots of ways to implement this sort of thing including using
RegExp or URI templates to evaluate the requested URI at runtime.

mca
http://amundsen.com/blog/
